div.p: The average Artic air concentrations of Hg 0 ( a), Reactive Gaseous Mercury (RGM = HgO + HgCl 2) ( b) and Total Particular Mercury (TPM = primary + oxidized particulate Hg) ( c) for the 1990s and 2090s divided into the contribution from North America (NA), Europe (EU), Asia (AS), and background concentration (BG).
